metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11065 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Gradle versions from 1.4 to 5.3.1 use an insecure HTTP URL to download dependencies when the built-in JavaScript or CoffeeScript Gradle plugins are used. Dependency artifacts could have been maliciously compromised by a MITM attack against the ajax.googleapis.com web site.

criterions.comment: gradle package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-10').
